description.value: You are adept at revealing—or creating—weaknesses among those who are a threat to civilization. If you roll a success on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] to identify an animal or a beast, you get a critical success instead. The next time you damage that creature, it gains weakness 5 during that attack to one damage type of your choice that you dealt it.
